Blizzard/Twister


*Blizzard sighs and keeps walking but looks behind her a=
nd than doesn't anymore*



Twister: Your right. It's not like she was goin=
g to let me stay anyway.

*Twister stands up*

Twister: I think we start lo=
oking now. The sooner the better. Partners?

*Twister says to Sinesis while=
 holding her fist out for him to hit his on*

  ----- Original Message ----=
- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, =
2000 5:33 PM
  Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


  Sinister listens=
 carefully to the words of Blizzard.

  "Who needs a home, Twister!? Let's =
just go find another team that wants us and we shall be on our way to glory=
!" Sinesis said to Twister...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: i=
lovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August 05, =
2000 6:02 AM
    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


    Blizzard/Twi=
ster


    *Blizzard begins walking*

    Blizzard:..Who am I kidding...I d=
on't know what to do, I probably eat myself!

    *Blizzard says sadly*

  =
  Blizzard: It seems the the whole world is against me accept for you. Even=
 my sister. I know the way she was acting, not normal.

    *Blizzard says =
to Sinister and sighs and continues walking*



    *Twister looks at Sines=
is*

    Twister: It was up to me tell the others too but I didn't because =
I didn't do it before I tried to stop Retroflame and I didn't after because=
 I was too concerned with saving myself....That was the past and the future=
 can be different but it isn't looking up now that we have no home...

    =
*Twister says to Sinesis

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: T=
HECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000=
 5:51 AM
      Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


      "Okay." Sini=
ster said lamely. He walked off with Blizzard whenever Blizzard walks off.
=

      Sinesis sighs.
       
      "I always said I never made any mistake=
s. That I was perfect, but once, I was supposed to fight some criminals tha=
t had a bounty on them, but I was not to harm anyone else. I killed that cr=
iminal for my own selfish needs, but he had a time bomb set. I thoguht I co=
uld disarm it, but all I did was set the time even lower, and some bots did=
n't have time to get away. I managed to get away since I knew about it, but=
 I never told them, so that's why I chose the evil path in life, I felt I h=
ad done something evil..." Sinesis said...
        ----- Original Message -=
---- 
        From: ilovealllizards 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      =
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 5:24 AM
        Subject: Re: The End is N=
ear...........


        Twister/Blizzard


        Twister: I was sent on =
a mission to stop another bot named Retroflame. She planed to blow up some =
other bots that didn't know a thing because she claimed that they were in h=
er way. I was given no partners for there were none to give. I didn't stop =
them....I tried but I was shelfish and excaped in a pod thinking of only my=
self and other bots were killed not only because of Retroflame but also bec=
ause of me....I deserved to be near that bomb.....There were missions befor=
e that but I wish not speak of for I have failed too many.......I wouldn't =
kill myself for I would probably be sent back down for the Matrix would not=
 want my selfish kind in.......

        *Twister says to Sinesis*


      =
  *Blizzard sighs and looks up again still frowning*

        Blizzard: We =
need to find shelter, my love.

        *Blizzard says to Sinister*

      =
    ----- Original Message ----- 
          From: THECODE 
          To: nb=
wrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
       =
   Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


          Sinesis walks to Twi=
ster.

          "A failure? When were you a failure? Tell me of one of you=
r adventures on Cybertron that was a failure." Sinesis said. Sinister shook=
 his head.

          "Unbelievable." Sinister said. Stronghold and Blender=
 look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Dracona's misfortune and t=
ake a smoke, then walk off to find another side to join, all the time hopin=
g that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really is and always will be =
a failure...
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: il=
ovealllizards 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Saturd=
ay, August 05, 2000 3:22 AM
            Subject: Re: The End is Near.......=
....


            Twister/Blizzard


            *Twister looks at what wa=
s left of the base*

            Twister: I always be nothing but a failer =
with nowhere to go...

            *Twister walks next to the pieces of the=
 base sits down staring at the ground*


            *Blizzard frowns and a=
 mech tear runs out of her optic*

            Blizzard: I'll never have a =
place to stay that I can actually call home.....

            *Blizzard low=
ers her head and sighs*

              ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
        From: THECODE 
              To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
              =
Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:10 AM
              Subject: The End is N=
ear...........


              Dracona looked into the pit. Plintissa wasn'=
t moving. Dracona smiled and walked back toward her base. A dagger flew int=
o Dracona's back. She spun around and grabbed the dagger in pain. Plintissa=
 stood there.

              "You do not know when to give up, you fool, bu=
t never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to grind you so small you won't =
be able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She kept her hand cove=
red and flung the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and hit Artist in the le=
g. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dacona and took her do=
wn. Dracona once again turned to her saw blade to saw into Plintissa. Draco=
na fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona started to burn everyth=
ing with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintissa was always a good=
 fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her bad life that she discovered h=
er true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracona mercilessly. Draocona's part=
s were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick through the air. D=
racona raised the saw blade and sliced the stick to pieces. Dracona laughed=
 and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. Plintissa fell.

             =
 "Th weak move aside and die so the strong can survive. As ancient as the C=
osmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintissa, you wer=
e a good friend, but don't take this personally, it's just business." Draco=
na said.
               
              Dracona pulled back the saw blade an=
d thrust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and t=
hrew it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as =
she did, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. D=
racona blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived o=
n the planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces everyw=
here. Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

              "*Cough, =
Cough* Zardus I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Draco=
na died smiling. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she wo=
uld never leave her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere=
 and she got weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He=
 was crying, too.

              "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way.=
" Plintissa whispered.

              "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? W=
hy does everyone betray me?" Artist asked.

              "Artist, there fl=
oats Dracona's spark, recover it, we can't part, she really was my friend."=
 Artist walked up and captured the extinguished spark as it tried to fly aw=
ay. He contained it in a capsule.

              "Plintissa, if you leave m=
e, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my friends are gone, my helping =
days are over." Artist said.

              "Your helping days are never ov=
er, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.

              "This isn=
't some lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is it?"

       =
       "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at Team =
Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was destroyed=
 by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally built it. =
And there it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis looks=
 at the base and sighs.

              "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess w=
e have to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.=


              "Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister sai=
d sadly.

              Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly=
 burst from her and floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he ne=
eded to do. He opened his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Art=
ist combined Plintissa's spark with his own, they became one.

            =
  "Till all are one." Artist whispered really low. Plintissa told him she s=
till loved him. Artist was overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now t=
hey could never be seperated again. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard an=
d Sinister, and Sinesis and Twister. ran out into a field.

              "=
Artist, now we need to take care of Dracona's spark." Plintissa said. (Reme=
mber, only Artist can hear Plintissa now) Artist headed toward the Maximal =
base, there Dracona would get a new body, one she could not attack anyone e=
ver again in, and where she can always be helpful. Artist held up the conta=
ined, Dracona's spark still inside.

              "I love you." Artist sai=
d seemingly to nobody.

              "I love you too." Plintissa said to A=
rtist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal base...
